citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on January
27, 2021.
Called contact phone number which was disconnected. Knocked on door, the neighbor came out and told me the
apartment was vacant. I spoke to leasing company who said Mr. Smith did live there a few months ago, but since has
abandoned the apartment without leaving any forwarding information.
A responsible person must be available to accompany the inspector on an animal welfare inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm on January 
27, 2021. 
 
Called contact phone number which was disconnected.  Knocked on door, the neighbor came out and told me the 
apartment was vacant.  I spoke to leasing company who said Mr. Smith did live there a few months ago, but since has 
abandoned the apartment without leaving any forwarding  information. 
 
A responsible person must be available  to accompany the inspector on an animal welfare inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
